subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Despite considering withdrawing due to exhaustion, Erik Compton, a two-time heart-transplant recipient, stuck with it and emerged from a playoff to claim a spot in next week’s tournament.
snippet: Despite considering withdrawing due to exhaustion, Erik Compton, a two-time heart-transplant recipient, stuck with it and emerged from a playoff to claim a spot in next week’s tournament.
